mapper.select: SELECT p.name, r.email, r.rename, r.comscore, r.lookup, r.recom, r.grade FROM review r, product p WHERE p.prodnum = #{prodnum}
SELECT p.name, r.email, r.rename, r.comscore, r.lookup, r.recom, r.grade FROM review r, product p WHERE r.email = #{email}
SELECT * FROM review WHERE renum = #{renum} OR `RENAME` = #{rename}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET `rename` = #{rename}, content = #{content}, grade = #{grade} where email = #{email} and renum = #{renum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (email, prodnum, `rename`, content, grade) VALUES (#{email}, #{prodnum}, #{rename}, #{content}, #{grade})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET reviewscore = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE prodnum = #{prodnum})
update product set review = (SELECT TRUNCATE(AVG(grade),0) FROM review WHERE prodnum = #{prodnum})
